<<<<<<< HEAD
Principiis obsta. The readie vvay to prevent sin By William Bagshaw. Bagshawe, William, 1628-1702.
[2], 48, 41 [i.e. 43], [1] p.
printed for Tho. Parkhurst, and are to be sold at the sign of the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside, London : 1671.
Includes with caption title and separate pagination: A bridle for the tongue. The register is continuous. Page 43 is misnumbered "41". Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.
=======
